query.sql: SELECT x, y, x + y, x - y, coalesce(x + y, x - y, x) FROM U WHERE x > 0
SELECT x, y FROM T WHERE coalesce(x, y) > 0
SELECT x, y FROM U WHERE coalesce(x, y) > 0
SELECT x, y, x + y, x - y, coalesce(x + y, x - y, y) FROM T
SELECT x, y, x + y, x - y, coalesce(x + y, x - y, x) FROM T WHERE x > 0
SELECT x, y, x + y, x - y, coalesce(x + y, x - y, y) FROM U
